nodes.text: The Imperial Database was an informational system of Imperial Intelligence. It contained listings of affiliations of specific organizations within the Galactic Empire that a member of the Imperial Military belonged to, their rank, their training certificates for various Imperial vehicles (including the TIE/LN starfighter, the TIE/IN interceptor, the TIE/sa bomber, and the TIE Avenger), Medals that the Imperial personnel won as well as embellishments for other actions taken during various battles, as well as their battle records.
The Imperial Database was the results screen for the game Star Wars: TIE Fighter as well as its expansion packs. It acted as the equivalent to the Farlander Uniform screen from Star Wars: X-Wing.
